scripts.start: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const opts=['frontend','mlb/frontend'];const dir=opts.find(d=>fs.existsSync(d+'/package.json'));if(!dir){console.error('No frontend found (looked in '+opts.join(', ')+')');process.exit(1);}require('child_process').spawn('npm',['start','--prefix',dir],{stdio:'inherit'});"
